title: Sinbad and the Caliph of Baghdad (1973) Robert Malcolm, Sonia Wilson | Adventure Movie

sources.title: Sinbad and the Caliph of Baghdad (1973) Robert Malcolm, Sonia Wilson | Adventure Movie
sources.description:
The sailor Sinbad is dragged by two cheaters on board a ship on which the beautiful Sherazade travels, promised to the Caliph of Baghdad.

Original title: Simbad e il califfo di Bagdad

Director & Writer: Pietro Francisci
Stars: Robert Malcolm, Sonia Wilson, Luigi Bonos 
Genre: Action, Adventure

This film is available with English & Italian audio. 
Go to video settings ⚙️  to change your audio / subtitle language options.


0:00 Full Movie opening scene - Murder on the dance floor
05:23 A sailor named Sinbad returns to Baghdad to find his home confiscated and faces trouble.
12:03 A sailor finds himself on a mysterious ship and faces challenges and intrigue.
28:00 A comedic and chaotic scene unfolds as characters interact in a kitchen setting.
34:50 A princess and Sinbad plan to escape from a forced marriage while facing challenges on a ship.
42:39 Two men stranded at sea on a small boat find a sunken ship and try to survive.
52:34 A thrilling adventure involving hot air balloons, treasure, and a fight for power.
1:04:28 A dramatic story unfolds at the Bazar Incognito involving auctions, deception, and a mysterious medicine.
1:12:43 A tale of deception and power struggles in Persia involving twin brothers.
1:23:16 A dramatic tale of betrayal, escape, and power struggles in Persia and Baghdad.
